page.title: 20LIFE STYLES
page.content: My mum wakes me up about half past seven. Sometimes I have breakfast. Then I go and get dressed. After that it's time to go for the taxi. When I arrive at school I have about ten mintues play. At nine o'clock we go in the hall and have assembly. A group of us play recorders. Soon it's time for maths, followed by English. After that we go out to play. Sometimes we do reading in a morning. Often we have radio or television broadcasts. Soon comes dinner, I have sandwiches most children have dinners, cooked in the school kitchen. After dinner play-time soon ends. Back in school we do a number of things, French, science, art, topic or perhaps swimming, P.E. or baking. School ends at 3.30pm. At home I watch television, have tea, then play until my mum calls me for bed.
